short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lookup tough words as you read

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voracious is a browser extension that lets you understand difficult words by showing definitions above them. Inspired from Kindle Word-Wise. Lookup tough words with minimum interruptions.
